general_advisory: Foggy weather may lead to increase infestation of Powdery Mildew in several winter vegetables and Mung, Urd. Spray Mixture of 1 litre water with 1 gram Thiophanate Methyl or 1 ml Tebuconazole.

advisory: There are chances of Solanaceae plant getting infested by bacterial wilt , First uproot the affected plants and destroy them then apply a mixture of Streptocyclin 6gram in 15 litre of water and give a flood irrigation in water channels.

For preventing CRD (Chronic Respiratory Disease) maintain litter properly , take care of disinfection and avoid ammonia build up in poultry shed. Stirring of the litter twice a day to make the litter dry .
